trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around October 3rd 2003
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Best photograph of a real ufo I've ever seen or heard of, also have a video of the incident, witnessed by myself and a friend,and all over the news the next day!
divs: Sighting DetailsI have told this story years ago, I had problems I choose not to explain, locked all my photos in my safe, everything was stolen in my house,including my safe but I had a CD in a hidden compartment. The object I have on video was simply amazing to see it fly east of us and capture all of this on video as well, I think the photos speak for themselves. Never believed in Ufo's till that night, my girlfriend as well. I did some research and yet to find photos that compare to what I have. I saw air crafts and helicopters going to the object and the ufo dwarfed them in size. The colors were amazing, at least 5 different colors and 1 red color spinning clockwise when moving. There also was a mother ship as well, if you want those photos, e mail me that you wish to see them, I'm reluctant to send all the pics as of now!! Nick condos
